title: How to Play As Mounts Effectively in Lord of the Rings: Conquest
category_hierarchy: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest

steps.headline: Start the game.
steps.description: Go to the campaign and start a mission. Make sure it's a mission with mounts available.

steps.headline: Choose a class.
steps.description: Begin, and progress through the mission until you find a mount.

steps.headline: Walk up to the dormant creature.
Press 'X/Square' for the basic heavy attack.
Press 'R2/RT' as Ents/Trolls to pick up enemies.
steps.description: Press it again to throw them.

steps.headline: Use 'Y/Triangle' as Ents/Trolls to use a roar that heals allies.
Press 'LB/L1' to heal yourself when damaged.
Attack enemies in small groups.
steps.description: Take them out and move on.

text: Start the game. Go to the campaign and start a mission. Make sure it's a mission with mounts available. Choose a class. Begin, and progress through the mission until you find a mount. Walk up to the dormant creature. Press 'X/Square' to mount it. Press 'X/Square' for the basic heavy attack.  Press 'R2/RT' as Ents/Trolls to pick up enemies. Press it again to throw them. Use 'Y/Triangle' as Ents/Trolls to use a roar that heals allies.  Press 'LB/L1' to heal yourself when damaged.  Attack enemies in small groups. Take them out and move on.
